title: [1.12.2][科技][吃货][人生][中低配]真实生存V1.1整合
author: Empress－zero
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Empress－zero 于 2020-2-25 13:17 编辑 


这是一个真实的世界，该如何生存下去呢？...本整合包使用HMCL启动器，使用时自行导入注意请使用openj9而不是java,同时请分配至少4000Mb内存以下为mod列表[AC]农业工艺AgriCraft https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/agricraftInfinity Lib https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/infinitylib[AE2]应用能源2Applied Energistics 2 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/applied-空间兼容SpatialCompat https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/spatialcompat[EC2]更多存储单元2Extra Cells 2 https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/[AC]农业工艺AgriCraft https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/agricraft[BC]建筑BuildCraft https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/BuildCra[LP]物流管道Logistics Pipes https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/l铁储罐Iron Tanks https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/iron-tanks[IC2]工业时代2Industrial Craft 2 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/industrial-craftCrops++ https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/berries重力装甲Gravitation Suite https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/gravitation-suite高清修复Optifine http://www.optifine.net/R键整理Inventory Tweaks https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/inventory-tweaks搬箱器Chest Transporter https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chest-transporter[JM]旅行地图Journey Map https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/journeymap[i18n]自动汉化更新I18nUpdateMod https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/i18nupdatemod怪物娘化Yarr Cute Mob Models - Remake https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/yarr-cut稀有精英怪Infernal Mobs https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/atomics合成冲突消除NoMoreRecipeConflict https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/stimmedcow-nomorerecipeconflict[BOP]超多生物群系Biomes O' Plenty https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/biomes-o-plenty[TAN]意志坚定Tough As Nails https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/Tough-[FFH]背井离乡Far from Home https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/far-from-home动态的树Dynamic Trees https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/[OTG]Open Terrain Generator https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/open-te意志坚定：热力附属Tough Expansion https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/tough-expansionRedstone Flux API http://teamcofh.comp455w0rd's https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/fast-leaf-decay溪流Streams https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/streamsFarseek https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/farseek[NEI]NEI物品管理器Not Enough Items  http://chickenbones.net/Pages/links.html[JEI]JEI物品管理器Just Enough Items https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/jei[CCL]CodeChickenLib http://chickenbones.net/Pages/links.html[GS]星空Galaxy
